actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 501(e) d of the Housing Act of 1949 for the purpose of requiring the Secretary of Agriculture to establish escrow accounts in order to assist persons receiving rural housing loans under such act.

summary.text: Amends the Housing Act of 1949 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to provide for the establishment of escrow accounts for taxes and insurance by borrowers for farm housing.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 501(e) d of the Housing Act of 1949 for the purpose of requiring the Secretary of Agriculture to establish escrow accounts in order to assist persons receiving rural housing loans under such act.
